name: UpdateMultiplePostalMails
description:
Update multiple postal mail records at once in HubSpot CRM.

Use this tool to update several postal mail objects within HubSpot CRM in a single request, streamlining batch modifications.

parameters.name: postal_mail_updates
parameters.description: JSON array containing objects with ids and properties to update postal mail records. Each object should include `idProperty`, `objectWriteTraceId`, `id`, and `properties`.

idProperty.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

objectWriteTraceId.description: A unique identifier for tracing the request.

id.description: The id to be updated. This can be the object id, or the unique property value of the idProperty property

properties.description: Key-value pairs representing the properties of the object.
